txt.en: Mara Sandydowns would like to thank you for your participation in the Yule Festival today.

'My, you're a festive one! I hope you are having a fun time at the Yule Festival!

'It seems fitting in this season of giving that you should have a gift, and so here you are!'

'Come back tomorrow and I shall have more gifts for you!'
Mara Sandydowns is excited to welcome visitors to Frostbluff and encourages them to partake in all of the festival's activities.

'Welcome to Frostbluff, my friend!

'If you're here for the Yule Festival, I'd recommend you get in the spirit of the season and participate in many of our fun Yule activities. If you're not here for the Yule Festival, maybe you should be!

'For those festive folks that participate in many of our activities, there might just be a Yule treat in store, so get out there!

'It's a bit chilly, but I'm sure you'll find warm company all around!'
Participated in Yule Festival activities in Frostbluff ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Participate in Yule Festival activities in Frostbluff ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Every day there is something to do in Frostbluff.  Every day there is Yule!  Come and join everyone in Frostbluff and participate in many Yule Festival activities!
